thread.title: House Democrat Vows Not To Shake Trump’s Hand At Address To Congress
thread.title_full: House Democrat Vows Not To Shake Trump’s Hand At Address To Congress

author: Jack Davis
title: House Democrat Vows Not To Shake Trump’s Hand At Address To Congress
text:
This year, Engel wanted to be sure his absence would be noted. 
Some on Twitter said is is Engel, not Trump, who is the problem. @AlexNBCNews @RepEliotEngel @POTUS Swamp Dweller Doesn't Want Swamp Drained: Film at 11. 
— Jeffrey Voth (@Acuda4me) February 28, 2017   @RepEliotEngel you should resign if you won't shake his hand. who was dumb enough to elect you? 
— Bacon (@marrybacon) February 28, 2017 
Engel said that his opposition was due to the Trump administration’s shortcomings. 
“Unfortunately, since January 20th, the new administration has shown no interest in working with the Congress on both sides to tackle problems, including Russia’s unlawful interference in last year’s election,” said Engel, the ranking Democrat on the House Foreign Affairs Committee 
“That’s why I’ve decided not to stand on the aisle of the House chamber to shake the president’s hand during this joint session of Congress, as I have done in the past through Democratic and Republican administrations alike,” Engel said.
